title: Need footage for montage!
body:
Hey guys! I'm practising making montages and stuff for LOL but I can't find any clips to use. If anyone has footage they want me to use please send me a link to the Youtube clip or add me in game and I'll give you my e-mail so you can send me stuff. I don't care if you're high or low elo, I just need some funny/decent plays.

TL;DR
I need some footage for a montage, link me some of yours pls.

P.S Here's a clip of a basic montage I made for a friend who did mountain biking https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tsaMVGwNSPM

replies.body: why not just let a lol recorder run in the background for 2 weeks and then get your own footage featuring yourself?
